data.description:
The ultimate VR Golf experience and the official VR Golf game of the PGA TOUR!

**Available on QUEST 2, 3, and Pro**

‚ÄúThe GOLF+ VR platform is a forward-thinking way to enjoy the sport that is appealing to gamers and golfers of all levels.‚Äù - PGA TOUR

‚ÄúThe visuals are fantastic. It‚Äôs like morphing into another universe filled with vibrancy, dynamism and, most important, realism.‚Äù - Sports Illustrated

‚ÄúThe putting function ‚Äî which simulator golf has never quite cracked ‚Äî is particularly eye-opening.‚Äù - GOLF Magazine


Includes:

‚õ≥Ô∏è Iconic Courses: 3 Free Courses (Cliffs, Alpine, Castle Links) and 15+ real-world destinations available for purchase including Pebble Beach, The Old Course at St Andrews, TPC Sawgrass and more.

üèåÔ∏èMultiplayer: Play with your circle of friends, or join public rounds and connect with golf enthusiasts worldwide.

üìà Performance Feedback: Advanced shot stats, strokes gained data, handicap system, and swing analyzer to help you understand and improve your game.

üèÜ Competitive Play: Climb the ranks and compete globally on the GOLF+ TOUR, or go head to head in Battle mode.

‚úÖ Real Golf Brands: Experience golf equipment from leading brands like Callaway, TaylorMade, and PXG.

üéØ Diverse Modes: From Match Play to Skins, Weekly Challenges and Topgolf, we have an experience for every player.

üèû GOLF+ Clubhouse: A place to practice, fine tune your clubs, and play fun mini-games.

üñ• Media Player: Seamlessly enjoy YouTube and other web media right on the course.

changelog.change_log:
Patch Fix Update v758.03

- Fixed an issue causing the Shot Shaper option to become unchecked every time you quit the app.

New Update v758.02

‚õ≥Ô∏è New Course: Muirfield Village Golf Club ‚õ≥Ô∏è

Forged from the mind of a legend, Muirfield Village's championship pedigree speaks for itself. Designed by the esteemed Jack Nicklaus and continually refined over the years, the challenging course plays host to the PGA TOUR‚Äôs prestigious Memorial Tournament. Demanding yet fair, the layout rewards precise shot-making and strategic thinking, inviting players to navigate complex greens, heavy rough, strategic bunkering, and water hazards lurking on 11 of its holes. Playing at Muirfield Village is more than just golf; it's an opportunity to engage with a course that embodies the spirit and history of the game.

**Bug Fixes & Quality:**
- Players could lose all audio sounds during a round. 
- Performance improvements on Yale Golf Course.
- Tournament tier badges would not show on Daily & Weekly Leaderboards.
- Text updates to Daily & Weekly Tournament Leaderboards.

New Update v758.01

‚õ≥Ô∏è New Course: Muirfield Village Golf Club ‚õ≥Ô∏è

Forged from the mind of a legend, Muirfield Village's championship pedigree speaks for itself. Designed by the esteemed Jack Nicklaus and continually refined over the years, the challenging course plays host to the PGA TOUR‚Äôs prestigious Memorial Tournament. Demanding yet fair, the layout rewards precise shot-making and strategic thinking, inviting players to navigate complex greens, heavy rough, strategic bunkering, and water hazards lurking on 11 of its holes. Playing at Muirfield Village is more than just golf; it's an opportunity to engage with a course that embodies the spirit and history of the game.

**Bug Fixes & Quality:**
- Players could lose all audio sounds during a round. 
- Performance improvements on Yale Golf Course.
- Tournament tier badges would not show on Daily & Weekly Leaderboards.
- Text updates to Daily & Weekly Tournament Leaderboards.

Patch v755.04

Bug Fixes:

- Fixed Public Multiplayer Games not showing for players.
- Fixed a crash caused by receiving a Topgolf game invite.
- Fixed a crash that was caused by corrupted data in the Tournament Summary end screen.

New Update v755.01

**New Feature: GOLF+ TOUR Daily Tournaments**

Daily Tournaments are now part of the GOLF+ TOUR. Golfers can now add points to their GOLF+ TOUR Ranking with daily competitions at a rotating selection of golf courses.
Each Daily Tournament will pay out 5% of the points earned via the weekly tournaments. All tiers will compete on the same course conditions, with the only difference between tiers being green speed. GOLF+ TOUR Ranking points will be assigned at the end of each tournament week (Thursday-Wednesday) based on the total Daily + Weekly performance within that player‚Äôs tier.

**Bug Fixes & Quality Updates:**
- The UI is now HD when in Giant Mode.
- Fixed an issue with the Media Player turning on after changing scenes.

Patch 754.03
- Fix G+ TOUR tournament entry.

New Update v754.01

**Updated Course: Valhalla Golf Club**
- The PGA of America, along with The Nicklaus Design team, added additional championship tees in strategic areas throughout Valhalla. Along with updated tees, work has been done to bring out many of the natural features of the golf course.

**Bug Fixes & Quality Updates**
- Optimized overall performance on Quail Hollow.
- Menu button could become unresponsive after changing scenes, or entering/leaving Giant Mode.
- Advanced Shot Stats for club path and face angle were showing incorrect values for left handed players.

Patch Build v753.05

Bug Fix:
- Due to a timing issue, a player's putter could sometimes not make contact with the ball when putting on the green.

New Update v753.04

New Course: Quail Hollow Golf Club

Steeped in golf history, Quail Hollow Club plays host to the PGA TOUR‚Äôs Wells Fargo Championship and soon, the 2025 PGA Championship.  
Quail Hollow Club also features ‚ÄúThe Green Mile‚Äù, the three-hole finishing stretch that has become known as one of the most challenging finishes on the PGA TOUR.

New Feature Update: Add A Friend
Improved our social feature for adding friends.  New main menu notifications for friends request and an updated post-round interface.

Bug Fixes & Quality:
- Fixed an issue where incorrect yardage distances could be shown in Practice mode
- Fixed an issue when subscribing to the G+ Pass via the footer would throw an 'offline' error
- Fixed an issue when adding friends post round that would cause an infinite loading screen
- Fixed an issue where game invites are sent again to the player/s when modifying a multiplayer game
- Fixed an issue in Battle where the UI would show incorrect club and yardage when changing courses
- Fixed an issue in Battle where your opponent could have a ball marker underneath their ball
- Fixed an issue where the leaderboard could go all white
- Fixed an issue with the Media Player will be in the way for Left Handed players when triggering to follow their ball
- Fixed an issue with accidental hits occurring when the controller becomes active after interacting with Meta overlays
- Wind direction now matches between Tournament Practice & Tournament Round
- Harbour Town: Updated the Lighthouse on Hole 18
- Harbour Town: Fixed a issue that was showing TPC Scottsdale on the leaderboard when playing Harbour Town
- Harbour Town: Fixed an issue with the flags not matching the wind direction
- East Lake: Fixed a floating tree left of the fairway on Hole 18
- Valhalla: Fixed areas of the Hole 13 green registering as OB
- Valhalla: Fixed cart paths registering as OB if ball came to rest there
- Yale: Turkeys are back!

Patch v752.9

Bug Fix:
- Fixed an issue in Amateur difficulty, Physics V2 with Shot Shaper not equipped, where the in-round Course screen would sometimes show the incorrect club image and club distance.

Patch Update v752.6

**Bug Fixes**
- Random corrupt replay data in 'Battle' would cause a lockup and result in a Defeat.
- Kiawah - Hole 4 - Bunkers were triggering OB.

New Update v752.3

**New Course: Harbour Town Golf Links**
Nestled within Hilton Head Island‚Äôs Sea Pines Resort, Harbour Town‚Äôs lush fairways wind through maritime forest and marsh, offering both beauty and strategic challenge. 
Known as the crowning achievement of famed designer Pete Dye and design consultant Jack Nicklaus, Harbour Town demands finesse, imagination, and shot making. 
Each spring, the course plays host to the PGA TOUR‚Äôs RBC Heritage featuring one of golf‚Äôs most recognizable vistas with the iconic lighthouse-framed 18th hole.

**New Feature: Shot Shaper V2**
The newly designed Shot Shaper is now available for Novice and Amateur difficulties.
The Shot Shaper for Amateur players on Physics V2 is an optional feature. To enable, go into your Settings under 'Game' and check the box for "Shot Shaper". This applies to players on Physics V2.
Players on Physics V1 will still automatically have the shot shaper equipped with the new design.
- There is a short tutorial available by clicking the icon on top left of corner of the Shot Shaper screen.

**Gameplay & Quality**
- Addressed frame drops that occur in Challenges when getting ball in the hole or tapping for a new ball.
- Addressed issues regarding resuming a Round after going OB.
- Addressed some audio distortion when Players come out of the teleport fade.
- Adjusted the button layout of the Challenges retry screen.
- Updated flag stick collisions to alleviate accidental bounce offs. 
- Selecting a Friend in Replays under your Profile will now automatically search for their Replays.
- CLicking 'play' during a Replay will now replay the shot and not require scrubbing playback.

**Bug Fixes**
- Fixed an issue with the Total Putts stat being incorrect.
- Fixed an issue where you could not recenter before the start of a Tournament Round or Practice Round.
- Fixed an issue in Battle that sometimes caused a strobing effect.
- Fixed practice divot and club impact streaks not aligning with your swing.

New Update v752.2

**New Course: Harbour Town Golf Links**
Nestled within Hilton Head Island‚Äôs Sea Pines Resort, Harbour Town‚Äôs lush fairways wind through maritime forest and marsh, offering both beauty and strategic challenge. 
Known as the crowning achievement of famed designer Pete Dye and design consultant Jack Nicklaus, Harbour Town demands finesse, imagination, and shot making. 
Each spring, the course plays host to the PGA TOUR‚Äôs RBC Heritage featuring one of golf‚Äôs most recognizable vistas with the iconic lighthouse-framed 18th hole.

**New Feature: Shot Shaper V2**
The newly designed Shot Shaper is now available for Novice and Amateur difficulties.
The Shot Shaper for Amateur players on Physics V2 is an optional feature. To enable, go into your Settings under 'Game' and check the box for "Shot Shaper". This applies to players on Physics V2.
Players on Physics V1 will still automatically have the shot shaper equipped with the new design.
- There is a short tutorial available by clicking the icon on top left of corner of the Shot Shaper screen.

**Gameplay & Quality**
- Addressed frame drops that occur in Challenges when getting ball in the hole or tapping for a new ball.
- Addressed issues regarding resuming a Round after going OB.
- Addressed some audio distortion when Players come out of the teleport fade.
- Adjusted the button layout of the Challenges retry screen.
- Updated flag stick collisions to alleviate accidental bounce offs. 
- Selecting a Friend in Replays under your Profile will now automatically search for their Replays.
- CLicking 'play' during a Replay will now replay the shot and not require scrubbing playback.

**Bug Fixes**
- Fixed an issue with the Total Putts stat being incorrect.
- Fixed an issue where you could not recenter before the start of a Tournament Round or Practice Round.
- Fixed an issue in Battle that sometimes caused a strobing effect.
- Fixed practice divot and club impact streaks not aligning with your swing.

**Patch v751.1**

- Fixed an issue where the "Next Hole" & "Play Again" buttons were blocked by the Power Meter if you were on Physics V1.

**New Update v751.08**

New Course: Bay Hill Club & Lodge

Host of the PGA TOUR‚Äôs Arnold Palmer Invitational presented by Mastercard, Bay Hill is known for its demanding layout and beautiful scenery.
Set amidst Central Florida‚Äôs lush rolling hills, the serene yet challenging experience is regarded as one of the harder stops on TOUR, with undulating greens, lengthy par 3s and enticing par 5s. For those who dare to take it on, Bay Hill encourages golfers to think creatively and to play boldly.

New Bundle Available: The PGA TOUR Bundle

Unlock 4 PGA TOUR venues at a 25% discount!
Test your game on the island 17th at TPC Sawgrass, soak in the electric atmosphere of TPC Scottsdale's stadium 16th, tackle the demanding layout of Arnold Palmer's Bay Hill Club, and step into golf history at The Riviera Country Club.

Gameplay:

- Added a new toggle Setting for "Always Show Green Contours" when on the Green.
- Added some additional degree rotations (5 & 10) for Snap Rotation in the Settings.
- Added an error message for Topgolf when trying to join a Friend on a different version of the game than you.
- Addressed frame drops, that would occur between "Next Hole" and the following tee box, holing out, and switching your clubs.
- Adjusted crowd sounds and animations that felt delayed and speed of the end of week GOLF+ TOUR recap upon startup.
- Players on the tee box in Unrestricted play will now be visible if you are in the waiting position.
- Reaching the stroke limit on a hole in Battle will only show the "Next Hole" button now.

Quality Updates and Bug Fixes:

- Corrected the spacing on the Battle Leaderboard when handling larger numbers.
- Addressed an issue with Player nametags always displaying and sized incorrectly.
- Fixed various incorrect player club customizations when playing in offline mode.
- Fixed an issue where you would see your putter briefly after selecting "Next Hole".
- Fixed an issue in Challenges where the distance to the pin was incorrect on the user interface.
- Fixed an issue where players could see their ball orient towards the hole when triggering to ball.
- Fixed an issue where the Tutorial would produce a flashing screen if launched while offline.
- Fixed an issue where the ball would be further away when teleporting to it after a tee shot.
- Fixed an issue with the "Top Shots" Leaderboard having inaccurate entries.
- Fixed an issue where the Knockout Leaderboard won't automatically open upon completing a Knockout game.
- Fixed an issue where the Tournament Leaderboard won't automatically open upon completing a Tournament Round.
- Fixed the Club Selection interface being unavailable when users Adjust Clubs in Controls under Settings.
- Fixed the inability to deselect an invited Friend during game creation if they went offline.
- Fixed some Audio sliders in the Settings adjusting incorrect sound types.
- Challenges & Mini-Games: Fixed an issue where tapping for a new ball could cause a shot to occur.
- Swing Analyzer: Fixed an issue where you couldn't view Physics V2 'Advanced Stats' when using trigger.
- Quick Play: Fixed an issue where the "Next Hole" button failed to appear when coming from an active Mini-Game.
- Topgolf: Players will no longer see other players' avatars and clubs in their Bay Monitor.
- Topgolf: Fixed an issue with "Leave Game" in Public/Private Topgolf lobbies not working on first attempt.
- Topgolf: Resolved a visual shimmer issue with the club head of the default Driver.
- Physics V2: Corrected a typo within the Swing Calibration steps.

New Update v749.0

**Updated Course: Pebble Beach Golf Links**

Experience the legendary Pebble Beach, with an updated look, for the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am happening this week.
Pebble Beach has been temporarily updated with tour signage, stands, and crowds to cheer you on during your rounds. 

The VR AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am will start on the GOLF+ TOUR this Thursday, Feb 1st.
Complete all rounds in your tier and automatically be entered into a drawing for a chance to win the course of your choice.
We will have a drawing for each tier, 20 winners! 

**Other Updates**
- Optimized crowd cheering sounds and reactions.

New Update v748.01 is now live!

New Course: The Riviera Country Club
Located in Los Angeles' Pacific Palisades, The Riviera Country Club has been at the pinnacle of golf for nearly a century.
Ranked as one of the top 25 golf courses in the United States. the 18 holes continuously challenge the world's best.
Legendary player Hale Irwin attests that "no two holes are alike and the course has been placed, rather than forced, into the land."
Currently home to The Genesis Invitational, Riviera will also host golf's elite in 2028 as the official site of the Olympics golf tournament.

Quality & Bug Fixes
- The wind speed/direction of a Tournament Practice Round now matches the official Tournament Round.
- Alpine - Hole 17 - Terrain fix near the right side fairway bunker.

New Update v746.01 is now live!

GOLF+ TOUR:
This week's GOLF+ TOUR event is at the Kapalua Plantation Course,
where the pros will also be teeing it up 01.04 for the 2024 PGA TOUR season opener. We've
added PGA TOUR treatment to the tournament lobby and updated Kapalua's green flags!

Quality & Bug Fixes:
- Attachment preset would reset if the custom set up wasn't saved.
- Leaderboards could sometimes show up fuzzy after completing a game.
- Pebble Beach - Hole 9 & 10 - Terrain fixes where ball could go under the rough.
- TPC Sawgrass - Hole 2 - Fixed tree collider on left that was interfering with tee shots.
- Menus could sometimes fire a web crash in specific game transitions.
- Fixed an issue with some settings not saving after uninstalling and reinstalling the app.

## Bug Fixes
‚¶Å Fixed issue with Quest 3 Graphics Quality slider not functioning for users
‚¶Å Fixed issue sometimes causing the fast forward button not to function
‚¶Å Fixed issue in Topgolf mode TopPractice where scores were not being kept for Singleplayer & Multiplayer
‚¶Å Fixed issue resulting in users being switched to Physics V2 after updating the app
‚¶Å Fixed issue where triggering to your ball close to it stopping would position the player away from the ball
‚¶Å Various performance improvements for Q2 & Q3
